reacting_to_news.title: Reacting to News
reacting_to_news.purpose: Respond to news from a friend with emotion, questions, and friendly tone.

opening.label: Opening: Greeting + Reaction
opening.purpose: Greet warmly and react to the news immediately.
phrases: Hi [Name]!
I just read your message and I can’t believe it!
Wow — that’s amazing news about [News]!
I’m so sorry to hear about [Problem]… are you okay?

main.label: Main: Feelings + Questions
main.purpose: Show emotion, ask questions, and keep the conversation going.
phrases: I’m honestly so [excited/proud/happy] for you — you really deserve it.
How did it happen? Tell me everything about [Details]!
If you feel like talking, I’m here — we can chat about [Situation] whenever you want.
What are you going to do next about [Plan/Decision]?
Either way, I’m sending you a huge hug from [Place].

closing.label: Closing: Friendly Ending
closing.purpose: End warmly and suggest continuing contact.
phrases: Write back soon!
Let’s catch up this weekend if you’re free.
Take care and message me anytime.
Best,
[Your Name]

apology.title: Apologising
apology.purpose: Apologise sincerely, explain briefly, and make it right.

opening.label: Opening: Say Sorry Clearly
opening.purpose: Apologise right away and name the problem.
phrases: Hi [Name],
I’m really sorry about [What Happened].
I just wanted to say sorry for [Mistake].
I feel terrible for [Situation], and I hope you can forgive me.

main.label: Main: Explanation + Fix
main.purpose: Explain briefly (no excuses), take responsibility, offer a solution.
phrases: There’s no excuse — I should have [Action].
The truth is, [Reason], but I know I handled it badly.
I completely understand why you’re upset about [Impact].
Can I make it up to you by [Solution]?
Next time, I promise I’ll [Change].

closing.label: Closing: Warm Ending
closing.purpose: End kindly and keep the relationship positive.
phrases: Thanks for reading this — it means a lot.
I hope we can move on from this.
Talk soon?
Take care,
[Your Name]

invitation.title: Inviting Someone
invitation.purpose: Invite a friend, give details, and suggest alternatives.

opening.label: Opening: Friendly Start
phrases: Hey [Name]!
How’s everything going?
I was thinking of you because [Reason].
Are you doing anything on [Day/Date]?

main.label: Main: Invite + Details
main.purpose: Give the invitation clearly and add practical details.
phrases: I’m having [Event] at [Place] and I’d love you to come.
It starts around [Time], but you can arrive whenever you want.
We could also go to [Alternative Place] if you’d prefer something different.
Bring [Item] if you like, but don’t worry if you can’t.
Let me know what works best for you — we can plan it together.

closing.label: Closing: Friendly End
closing.purpose: End positively and ask for a reply.
phrases: Hope you can make it!
Text me when you know.
Can’t wait to see you!
Cheers,
[Your Name]

giving_advice.title: Giving Advice
giving_advice.purpose: Respond supportively, give suggestions, and encourage your friend.

opening.label: Opening: Supportive Start
opening.purpose: Show empathy and introduce your advice gently.
phrases: Hi [Name],
Thanks for telling me about [Problem] — that sounds stressful.
I’m really glad you reached out.
I’ve been thinking about what you said about [Situation].

main.label: Main: Advice + Options
main.purpose: Give practical advice, offer alternatives, and encourage.
phrases: If I were you, I’d start by [Step 1].
It might be a good idea to [Suggestion], especially because [Reason].
Another option could be [Alternative], if you don’t feel ready for [Action].
Try not to worry too much about [Fear] — you’re stronger than you think.
Whatever you decide, I’m sure you’ll do the right thing.

closing.label: Closing: Encouraging End
closing.purpose: End positively and offer ongoing support.
phrases: Let me know how it goes.
I’m here anytime you need to talk.
Good luck — you’ve got this!
All the best,
[Your Name]

arranging_plans.title: Arranging and Planning
arranging_plans.purpose: Make plans, discuss preferences, and agree on details.

opening.label: Opening: Starting the Plan
opening.purpose: Start the conversation and suggest meeting.
phrases: Hi [Name]!
Are you free this [Weekend/Evening]?
I’d love to catch up — it’s been ages.
Do you fancy doing something on [Day]?

main.label: Main: Options + Preferences
main.purpose: Suggest options, negotiate preferences, and confirm practical details.
phrases: We could meet at [Place] around [Time] if that suits you.
Would you rather do [Option A] or [Option B]?
If the weather’s bad, we can always switch to [Backup Plan].
I’m fine with anything, but I’d prefer [Preference] if possible.
Let’s decide by [Day/Time] so we can book [Tickets/Table].

closing.label: Closing: Confirm + Friendly End
closing.purpose: Confirm the plan and end warmly.
phrases: Perfect — message me when you know!
Can’t wait!
See you soon!
Bye for now,
[Your Name]
